trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around December 28th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsAs we left the local grocery store we looked up and started wishing on the only "bright" star in the sky. As I left my grandmothers that star was gone and the sky was dark with no signs of any stars at all. I drive home an notice the same bright circle of light and realize it is the same thing we thought was a star. I am watching it not move and pull over to try and take a pic and then it moves in my direction. I also realized there was another object the same as this not far in the distance. The way the objects were hovering and the movements blew my mind. I called my cousin, but no one else believes me. After freaking out while on the phone I decided to drive the rest of the way home since it wasn't a good neighborhood. I wonder if anyone else seen these tonight??
